title: Is the law of abortion in the temple of Satan Su of Missouri?
subtitle: The judicial proceedings brought by one of the members against the Missouri abortion rule have opened an important debate.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: A member of the Devil's Temple filed a lawsuit in 2018 on the grounds that the Missouri Act, which requires a woman seeking abortion to receive a brochure confirming that life begins when she is pregnant, violates her religious beliefs.
